iata:awbLineID.description: Identifies uniquely each line-item contained in the document

iata:awbLineQuantity.description: Indicates the number of Loose Items and/or ULD's as accepted for carriage

iata:awbLineGrossWeight.description: Indicates the gross weight. Element values limited to range 0.1-10000001

iata:awbLineRateClassCode.description: Code representing a specific rate category

iata:awbLineHarmonizedCommodityCodeIssue.description: Number identifying goods for Customs or statistical purposes

iata:awbLineHarmonizedCommodityCodeValue.description: Number identifying goods for Customs or statistical purposes

iata:awbLineCommodityCodeIssuer.description: Reference identifying the type of standard code to be used for the Commodity Classification (Brussels Tariff Nomenclature, EU Harmonized System Code, UN Standard International Trade Classification)

iata:awbLineCommodityCodeValue.description: Commodity Code used by Customs for tax and duties calculation

iata:awbLineCommodityItemNumber.description: Indicates the specific commodity on which the rate class code is applied

iata:awbLineChargeable Weight.description: Consignment net weight. Element values limited to range 0.1-10000001

iata:awbLineRateChargeDiscountAmount.description: Indicates the amount of the rate, charge or discount. Element values limited to range 0.0001-99999999

iata:awbLineItemTotal Charge.description: Indicates the total charge of an item

iata:awbLineRCP.description: Indicates the point over which sector rates are combined (RCP). Must be a city code.

iata:awbLineULDRateClassType.description: Coded description of a Unit Load Device rate class

iata:awbLineRateClassCodeBasis.description: Basis on which the Rate Class Code is applicable

iata:awbLineRateReferenceCode.description: A unique code to indicate the applicable rate

iata:awbLineRateReferenceType.description: Indicate the type of rate reference e.g. contract, adhoc etc

iata:awbLineRatingTypeIndicator.description: F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail. Face Rate refers to the freight rate mentioned on the Air Waybill. Actual Rate refers to the actual freight rate applied to the Shipmentl. Published Rate refers to the freight rate that is public information (e.g. TACT) and therefore largely indisputable. Note: There is possibility that Face rate is the same as Published rate. Note: FWB v 17 supports only the Face value rating. Default Rating Type Indicator value is F i.e. Face

iata:awbLineTotalChargeDiscountAmount.description: Indicates the total amount of the charge or discount. Element values limited to range 0.000-999999999999

iata:awbLineGoodsDescription.description: Contains a Text description of an consignment item level (e.g. Description for Dangerous Goods)

iata:awbLineOriginCountry.description: Contains the ISO Country Codes ISO 3166-1/1998. UNECE Recommendation N. 3 - Code for the Representation of Names of Countries

iata:awbLineNoDimensionAvailable.description: This field should be completed with NDA (No Dimension Available)

iata:awbLineVolumeAmount.description: Cubic measure of a consignment. Element values limited to range 0.01-1000000001

iata:awbLineCustomsOriginCode.description: Code indicating the origin of goods for Customs purposes (e.g. For goods in free circulation in the EU) List to be provided by local customs authorities
